input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Billing Discrepancy Charges

There were unexpected charges on my account due to a billing discrepancy You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. This might have occurred due to a system glitch following the recent upgrade. I have reviewed the billing statements and contacted support, but a resolution has not been received yet My name is John Doe.. I would appreciate it if you could look into this matter and provide a suitable solution.
